text:
Except in cases where prevailing wages are paid pursuant to Section 
66A.19, all individuals performing work financed in whole or part by a Seismic Safety Loan shall be paid not less than $10.00 per hour, excluding overhead and benefits. 
(Formerly Sec. 66A.19; added by Ord. 100-94, App. 3/11/94; amended by Ord. 237-96, App. 6/11/96; amended and renumbered by Ord. 2-01, File No. 001969, App. 1/12/2001) 
(Former Sec. 66A.18 renumbered as Sec. 66A.17 by Ord. 2-01.)
